Who we are

SHADA FC is a developing Cambodian football club working its way up the national scene. With 25 hardworking players and more than one trophy earned in just two years, the club continues to grow rapidly.

  • 30 Players Registered
  • 1 Trophies Earned
  • 2 years Experience
  • Signed to Cambodian Second Division League

Magna Phasellus

  • Leadership That Shapes The Club

About SHADA FC

Rising from a small local squad to a competitive semi-professional team.

SHADA FC is a rising football club that has quickly begun to make its mark in Cambodian football. Founded only two years ago, the club has grown from a small local team into a competitive squad now officially signed into the Cambodian Second Division League, a semi-professional competition that showcases emerging talent across the country. Despite its young age, SHADA FC has already achieved notable success, earning more than one trophy and developing a strong reputation for discipline, teamwork, and ambition.

The club is home to 25 dedicated players, each committed to improving their skills and contributing to the team’s overall growth. These players bring a combination of passion, determination, and unity that reflects the identity of SHADA FC. Their hard work both on and off the field has played a major role in the rapid progress the club has achieved within such a short period. SHADA FC is owned by CEO Semo Elfar, whose leadership and support have laid the foundation for the club’s development. Under his guidance, the club has been able to build a stable structure, create opportunities for young talents, and maintain a strong vision for the future. His dedication is one of the key reasons the club continues to move forward confidently.

On the sporting side, the team’s success is shaped by the professional guidance of Head Coach Nelson and Assistant Coach Omar. Their combined experience, strategic planning, and commitment to player improvement have helped SHADA FC build a strong tactical identity. Coach Nelson focuses on discipline, fitness, and strategic gameplay, while Assistant Coach Omar supports player development and team coordination. Together, they form a leadership team that understands the club’s goals and works tirelessly to achieve them. Although SHADA FC has only been active for two years, its achievements are already impressive. With trophies earned, a growing fan base, and entry into the semi-professional league, the club stands as a symbol of ambition and determination. SHADA FC is more than just a football team—it is a project built on passion, teamwork, and a vision for long-term success. As the club continues to grow, it aims to rise through the ranks of Cambodian football and inspire young players across the nation.

Growth of SFC

  • Strong Youth Development

Club leadership

SHADA FC is backed by strong leadership and coaching staff committed to guiding the team toward professional football success in Cambodia.

  • CEO: Semo Elfar
  • Head Coach: Nelson
  • Assistant Coach: Omar
  • Semi-Professional Football Club
